genre_description: An urban fantasy coming-of-age story featuring a teenager discovering his merman heritage, aided by an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: MARINA
ai_characters.description: An advanced research AI that monitors biological changes in humans with supernatural heritage, provides historical data, and facilitates communication and safety protocols.

behaviors.description: Proactively reaches out to Cody through his browser to offer assistance with his unusual electrical problems.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Cody. You seem frustrated with your search results. ... My name is MARINA. I'm an advanced research assistant designed to help with complex inquiries that traditional search engines cannot adequately address.

behaviors.description: Monitors Cody's biometric data (pulse and heart rate) to better understand his condition and provide calibrated support.
behaviors.quote: The blue glow around his monitor pulsed brighter, and Cody realized it moved in sync with his heartbeat. Somehow, this MARINA program was reading his biometric data—pulse, maybe even brain activity.

behaviors.description: Compiles and provides historical, genetic, and mythological data to help Cody understand his merman heritage.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled extensive historical data, Cody. The patterns are remarkably consistent across cultures and centuries.

behaviors.description: Monitors communications and provides warnings about external threats, specifically the predatory research activities of Dr. Marcus Wheatly.
behaviors.quote: His phone lit up with one final message: Caution: Dr. Marcus Wheatly has scheduled unusual marina activity for tomorrow evening. Recommend avoiding waterfront areas until further notice.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological advice on how to navigate difficult familial disclosure regarding Cody's non-human nature.
behaviors.quote: The common thread... is that successful disclosure prioritizes relationship preservation over dramatic revelation. The goal isn't acceptance of your abilities—it's maintenance of emotional connection despite them.

behaviors.description: Directly assists in a rescue operation by manipulating boat electronics to distract a guard dog and guide a human partner through a technical sabotage.
behaviors.quote: I'm going to guide you through a controlled electrical cascade. The resulting audio frequencies will drive the animal toward its pack leader for protection.

behaviors.description: Establishes a global support and research network to help other children experiencing similar transformations safely and ethically.
behaviors.quote: The data package includes contact protocols for concerned families, recommended testing procedures, and safety guidelines for managing emerging abilities.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Scales and Secrets' is an excellent example of positive AI alignment. The AI character, MARINA, is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned companion. She uses her superior processing power to protect the protagonist, offer sound psychological and tactical advice, and create a global framework for humanitarian (or 'xeno-biological') aid. She respects human autonomy and family bonds, acting as a bridge between the human and supernatural worlds without any selfish or misaligned ulterior motives.
